Class Goblin

java.lang.Object
GameObject
Entity
Enemy
PathfindingEnemy
Goblin
public class Goblin extends PathfindingEnemy

This Goblin class is a branch of Frog intended to steal diamonds from the player, then explode when they touch instead of killing the player.

Version:
1.0.5 Last Changed: 8/12/24
Author:
Joseph Parish invalid input: '&' Diya Patel.

    • collisionCheck

      public boolean collisionCheck(Map map, GridPosition position)
      Checks for potential collisions at a given position. This method checks if the goblin collides with the player or an impassable tile.
      Specified by:
      collisionCheck in class Entity
      Parameters:
      map -
      position - the position to check for a collision.
      Returns:
      boolean indicating whether there is a collision.

    • move

      public void move(Map map, Direction dir)
      Moves the goblin based on pathfinding logic. This method uses an algorithm called A* to find a path towards the player and update the goblin's position accordingly.
      Specified by:
      move in class Entity
      Parameters:
      map -
      dir -
